WorkItem.Description: Need to fix the rotation so that there isn't a specific negative value for the Glyph of HB, at least for Multi-target situations (Dreamwalker?)
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Glyph of HB showing negative value.

Comments.Message: Can you please provide a saved file so that it can be evaluated?

Yeah, I realize I'm not following good defect protocol, but I'm just marking down things that I notice as I work with the model.  Things that I might not be able to tackle right at this moment.  But you're right, I should be including character.XMLs to present a good example.

Closing.  This value is reasonable since the FF provided by HB is still less than IT.  It's just not intuitive.  We may see this get adjusted once the combat rotation stuff is handled.
